articles.title: HTC U24 Pro launches as yet another mid-range phone, but a pretty good one - 9to5Google
articles.description: Following its pattern over the past few years, the HTC U24 Pro has launched as yet another mid-range Android phone.
articles.content:
HTC has just launched its latest mid-range Android phone, as everyone continues to forget the company is still making smartphones.

articles.title: Morning Frost on Mars Seen Dusting Tallest Mountains in Surprising First - ScienceAlert
articles.description: It's been known for years that there are large quantities of water ice locked up in the Martian poles.
articles.content:
It's been known for years that there are large quantities of water ice locked up in the Martian poles. Around the equator however it is a barren dry wasteland devoid of any surface ice.
